name: item-shop-1
headline: Travelling Merchant Comes to Town
article: An old wagon rolled into town today, containing all manner of mystical items. The equally old owner of the store offers to sell you an item from their selection.

outcomes.customDescription: Due to a 'paperwork error' all the guilds requests have been marked as complete.
The chest contains a massive empty space. Adventurers decide to move into the free real-estate.
The Arcanists say these glowing fungi helps them see into other dimensions, we assume this helps their magical research.
"Alrighty, I'll come back another time!"

name: item-shop-2
headline: Travelling Merchant Has Returned
article: An old wagon rolled into town today, containing all manner of mystical items. The equally old owner of the store offers to sell you an item from their selection.

outcomes.customDescription: These magic beans energise adventurers when made into a bitter potion. We've been awake for 3 days and never felt better!
This little lute plays the most adorable songs. The performers love to sing along.
This mystical object shifts itself to the lowest point of any surface. The brawlers are mystified by it's power and play with it endlessly...

modifier.reason: from the Orb of Slope Detection

outcomes.customDescription: "Alrighty, I'll come back another time!"

name: item-shop-3
headline: Travelling Merchant Arrives
article: An old wagon rolled into town today, containing all manner of mystical items. The equally old owner of the store offers to sell you an item from their selection.

outcomes.customDescription: This 'magical' item points you in the direction of forest cheese, a very real and very tasty thing.
This will make the Diviners self-flagellation parties much more exciting.
The Outriders have agreed that it's only fair to take turns using it for their subterfuge.
"Alrighty, I'll come back another time!"

name: mirror-mirror
headline: Mirror Mirror
article: A magic mirror has been brought in by a travelling merchant, its powers unknown, and purpose dubious. The merchant says anyone may step forward to harness its effects (for a fee, of course).

outcomes.customDescription: The scraggly Brawler looks in the mirror to see a dashing hero. Before your eyes they transform! They are adored by their fellow Brawlers.
The Arcanist studies the mirror, before seeing stacks of books start to pour out of the mirror in front of them.
These books will keep the Arcanists busy (+3 satisfaction)
A commoner steps forward, and stares in the mirror to see a princess, only to blink away a moment later. I wonder if they'll come back?

nextEvent.name: mirror-mirror-2
nextEvent.headline: The Pauper is a Princess!
nextEvent.article: We received an envoy from a far away kingdom today, with the good news that the commoner who recently vanished by a trickster merchant was in fact turned into a princess! She's sent a generous offer in exchange for us sending us all her stuff.

outcomes.customDescription: It's nice to have rich friends for once...
The merchant shrugs, walks right into the mirror, and both of them blink away in a puff of smoke.

name: tarot-cards-1
headline: Fortune Teller Comes to Town
article: A mysterious fortune teller comes to you, holding a selection of tarot cards. "Make a choice, what will your future hold?"

outcomes.customDescription: You touch it, and have a vision of the burning power of your righteous quest turning away those who would do you harm...
You touch it, and have a vision of a tower blowing up. You probably should have seen this coming...
You touch it, and have a vision of merriment spreading across your town...
"Those who are blind to the future are not protected by it"

name: tarot-cards-2
headline: Fortune Teller Emerges from the Forest
article: A mysterious fortune teller comes to you, holding a selection of tarot cards. "Make a choice, what will your future hold?"

outcomes.customDescription: You touch it, and have a vision of a lost adventurer wandering into the middle of a crossroads, blinking away, and in their place a sack of gold. A bargain made...
You touch it, and have a vision of a divine beacon, leading the way...
You touch it, and have a vision of the wonders of the universe being unravelled...

choices.name: I Don't Need to See My Future

outcomes.customDescription: "Your future will come, whether you are aware of it or not."
